server.model.database

Class AdminDBAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.model.database.AdminDBAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdapterInterface, AdminAdapterInterface

    public class AdminDBAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements AdminAdapterInterface
    Handles the system's requests to the database, from the administrator's perspective. Contains a reference of Database to process those requests and receive results. Implements AdminAdapterInterface
